mapper.sql: id, mission_name, mcoin_amount, freebies_id, freebies_type, complete_pic_url, incomplete_pic_url, seq, android_scheme, ios_scheme, mission_type, mission_scope
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from mcoin_mission
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update mcoin_mission
